title: [NDS]Word_Academy[EUR][TANKASPEL-com].zip
description:
Lang: English

Are you curious? Do you like to learn new things? What is a palindrome? Learn interesting new words in a fun way with Word Academy. Word Academy is a game that will help you discover new words through six different minigames and play with your friends through five other multiplayer games. Choose between four different coaches that will help you through the game. With Word Academy, impress your mum or dad with your new vocabulary.

Learn interesting new words in a fun way! This game helps you develop your vocabulary through a series of fun minigames.

Word Academy is for kids between 7 to 12 years old who want a fun and entertaining way to discover new words with definitions and how to spell them.

It has over 16 800 words from the Cambridges Advanced Learner Dictionary 2ndedition. With full official dictionary definitions.Words are powerfulImprove your Word Power by playing games!

It has been designed in collaboration with linguists to adapt to your level, track and reward your personal progression.


Visit tankaspel com for more games
